EntryName	PTHY_HUMAN
ProteinName	Parathyroid hormone (PTH) (Parathormone) (Parathyrin)
GeneName	PTH
Length	115
Function	PTH elevates calcium level by dissolving the salts in bone and preventing their renal excretion. Stimulates -2-deoxy-D-glucose (2DG) transport and glycogen synthesis in osteoblastic cells.
Subcellular Location	Secreted
